title: Test
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 10 data points.
Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.
Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 05/06 to 07/08, roughly constant from 07/08 to 10/11, and lastly slightly increasing from 10/11 to 14/15.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 10/11 and 11/12.
Max Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 77.87 was recorded at Year 14/15
Min Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 45.83 was recorded at Year 05/06
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, with a total of 10 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 10/11 to 14/15.
Similarly, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 05/06 to 08/09.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly constant which exists from 08/09 to 10/11.
